Debt Recovery Law in India

Debt Recovery: An Introduction ‘Debt recovery’ according to the Black Law Dictionary refers to legal procedures and approaches used to reclaim money loaned to someone else. In simpler terms, it involves legitimate methods to retrieve extended funds, with or without interest. Initially, India’s insolvency laws
